text: for you to identify the things that really matter;Yes indeed, “the things that really matter”—the point of identifying them is to concentrate our attention and energy on them. that you may be sincere and blameless until the Day of Christ,In verse 6 the emphasis is on God's sovereignty, here it is on our responsibility. “The Day of Christ” is of special relevance to Christians, and the particular aspect in view here is the accounting (see Romans 14:12,14).
